title: Java Fruit & Shake Vending Machine
description: Project for CCPROG3, a vending machine application with functionalities like buying, restocking, and adding items

title: Anime Forum Website - Fanime
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an app.

title: Ruby Payroll Application System
description: The Weekly Payroll System, built in Ruby, helps manage payroll by letting users set and update default settings, then generate daily and weekly salary reports based on employee work hours and day types. It accurately calculates regular, night shift, and overtime pay.

title: Culinary Class/Training Management Database App
description: The Culinary Class/Training Management project involves creating a database application to manage records of attendance, trainees, mentors, and training programs, along with supporting transactions for enrollment and trainee evaluations, and generating reports on trainee evaluations and payment status. Each module and report is assigned to a specific group member for development.

title: Java Sorting Algorithms
description: This project evaluates the performance of Insertion Sort, Selection Sort, Merge Sort, and Quick Sort in Java, analyzing their complexity, efficiency, and sensitivity to different sample sizes, and presents the implementation process, experimental observations, and key findings supported by theoretical knowledge.

title: Java Social Connection Graphs
description: This project explores the social graph structure of Facebook networks from American colleges, using a dataset of 34,216 account IDs across five institutions.  A Java program was developed to identify account connections efficiently by utilizing a Hashmap for data storage and retrieval, and a Breadth-First Search (BFS) algorithm for traversing connections.

title: Simple Python Budget App
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an app.
